ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: What should have also been said is : Thou art a bard and all shall tread on thee for thou shalt have no demenses Kitasi Who dies as much as Sylly and Talies
ygData.messageBody:
What should have also been said is :

"Thou art a bard and all shall tread on thee for thou shalt have no
demenses"

Kitasi
Who dies as much as Sylly and Talies put together I bet!

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 2:54 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Petiton to replace level 14 song


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 01:29 PM 9/22/99 -0500, you wrote:
>
>Ramundo's Recitement of Revival Skill: singing Target: self Mana: 100%
>(usable only 1 per game day) sold in Erudin
>
>This is totally in keeping with the bardic image - we all die A LOT!~ And
by
>lev 14 have considerable practice in finding r corpses and getting r stuffs
>back. So, now its time to lighten the load some and get us start getting
>used to the fact that some high 40 song will burn mana too. Also, finally
a
>use for all that clarity I get casted on me. Now this should not be a get
>out of jail free card but function like the Cleric's revive/resuss - you
>come back to ur corpse and are staggering all over with no str/sta/agi/dex.

Um - sorry to say, but it has already been etched in case-hardened steel:
"Thou shalt not trod upon the demesnes of the Cleric."

In other words: Nope, ain't gonna happen.

Talies who dies more than Sylly does, betcha betcha
